business.name: Quiklick Consultancy
business.details: Quiklick Consultancy provides customized consulting services in strategy, operations, market research, and training. Their expert team is focused on delivering results, helping businesses tackle challenges and achieve their goals.

business.name: Hassi Logistics
business.details: Hassi Logistics offers reliable logistics services, including freight forwarding, warehousing, and distribution, to ensure timely and safe delivery of goods. With a focus on efficiency and reliability, they are committed to streamlining your supply chain and becoming your go-to logistics partner.

business.name: Wings Platter
business.description: Taste the Best African Dishes in Tseaddo
business.details: Wings Platter serves a variety of flavorful chicken wings in a cozy, casual dining setting. With a fusion of local and international tastes, it's the perfect spot for family and friends to enjoy a delicious meal.
